oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Note with lock of hair of Benjamin Allen and Martha Allen
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Throughout the 19th century is was common to share locks of hair as symbols of sentimentality. On Dec. 29, 1859 Benjamin Allen married Martha J. Walker with J. West administering. Lurecia Hoofmister and Martha Walker Allen were sisters. Benjamin Allen enlisted in Co. D, 8th Tenn. Inf. Regt., USA in May 1863 at Camp Dick Robinson, Kentucky. He contracted typhoid fever and died July 6, 1863.
